headline: Sands Takes a Holistic Approach to Team Member Advancement With Well-Being Initiatives
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESSWIRE / November 19, 2024 / Las Vegas Sands: Las Vegas Sands Sands' commitment to Team Member advancement goes beyond job-related training and continuing education programs as part of a holistic approach to helping Team Members ...

headline: Marina Bay Sands Eyes Singapore’s Largest Loan of $9 Billion
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Marina Bay Sands is seeking a loan of around S$12 billion ($9 billion), in what would be the largest financing from Singapore, as the company looks to fund the planned expansion of its casino resort in the city state.
